title: Guard Ollama context cache against invalid timestamps
description:
**As a** Consoul user
**I want** the Ollama context cache to treat invalid cached_at values as stale
**So that** bad cache entries don't crash context size lookups

**Context:**
`OllamaContextCache.get` calls `datetime.fromisoformat` without guarding invalid values (`src/consoul/ai/context_cache.py:88`). A malformed or empty cached_at can raise and bubble up to callers.

**Technical Notes:**
- `src/consoul/ai/context_cache.py:88`

**Acceptance Criteria:**
**Given** a cache entry with invalid or missing cached_at
**When** get(model_id) is called
**Then** it returns None (stale) without raising

**Testing Considerations:**
- Unit test with malformed cached_at values
- Verify valid entries still return context_size

**Implementation Hints:**
- Wrap parsing in try/except and treat errors as stale
